body: What is it about those op guys that pay to get diamond while we just want to have fun and we die instantly
body_tagged: What is it about those op guys that pay to get diamond while we just want to have fun and we die instantly
title: open men are open mean

replies.body: I meant op men are op mean
replies.body_tagged: I meant op men are op mean

replies.body: diamond is just a rank, they don't physically get diamond armor...
replies.body_tagged: diamond is just a rank, they don't physically get diamond armor...

replies.body:
Taught it was SSundee for 0.1 seconds, also the Diamond rank isn't op at all.

You only gain an XP boost 2.5x. Have a peek in the shop for more infos on the rank. http://avicus.net/shop.
